#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main() {long int n,k,i;
            cin>>n;
            while(n--)
            {cin>>k;
            long long int a[k],l;
            cin>>a[0];
            l=a[0];
            for(i=1;i<k;i++)
            {cin>>a[i];
            l=__gcd(l,a[i]);}
            cout<<l<<"\n";
            }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
